Reviews.Content: It does what it says on the tin       The towel art left by the maid
Reviews.Author: JackieNorthampton

Reviews.Content: completely disappointing first the good points: very nice rooms and quiet beautiful yard and pool areanow the not so good: it is completely surrounded by one big building site so no peaceful daysfifty percent of the staff is friendly and ninetynine percent is totally incapable and doesn't care about it or anything elsethey only speak the tiniest bit of english, no german they don't even speak a good spanish(maybe they speak french)we had to go to the reception,(which is in the Alisios Hotel because there is no one at the Sueno Reception all day and night)...at least five times on three days to get the airconditioning repaired, twice to get a key for the safe and so onthere are persons at the bars who don't know the simplest kind of drinks even if they have it on their drinks of the day listthe way to the beach is through one building site and one old and left hotelif you have a choice, don't go there
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
